required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Patient Outcome After Cardiac Double Valve Replacement at University Hospital Basel/ Switzerland
clinical_study.official_title: Patient Outcome After Cardiac Double Valve Replacement at University Hospital Basel/ Switzerland

brief_summary.textblock: To compare patient outcome data after cardiac double valve replacement (aortic and mitral valve) with patient outcome data after aortic valve replacement and mitral valve reconstruction

detailed_description.textblock: To compare patient outcome data ( death, re-surgery, change in transvalvular gradient) after cardiac double valve replacement (aortic and mitral valve) with patient outcome data after aortic valve replacement and mitral valve reconstruction in patients with cardiac surgery at University Hospital Basel/ Switzerland since 2009.

primary_outcome.time_frame: time from hospitalisation for cardiac valve surgery and following 12 months
time from hospitalisation for cardiac valve surgery and following 12 months
time from hospitalisation for cardiac valve surgery and following 12 months
primary_outcome.description: change in transvalvular Gradient after cardiac valve surgery

intervention.description: cardiac double valve surgery (aortic and mitral valve)

study_pop.textblock: patients undergoing cardiac double valve surgery (aortic valve replacement, mitral valve replacement, mitral valve reconstruction) at University Hospital Basel/ Switzerland, starting 2009

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- patients undergoing cardiac double valve surgery (aortic valve replacement, mitral valve replacement, mitral valve reconstruction) at University Hospital Basel/ Switzerland, starting 2009
Exclusion Criteria:
- denial of consent
